title: FS: Myers/Davis color shift ($300) & Hemphill Sheet # ($100) - Reduced 1/14
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Myers/Davis color shift ($300) & Hemphill Sheet # ($100) - Reduced 1/14
posts.post_content:
I am a little surprised I still have these. I need funds for another deal so let's try an aggressive drop to get them sold. Thanks.


Prices include shipping to the lower 48 (I will ship elsewhere for additional $). Paypal FF.

Myers: $300
The huge color shift on Myers puts a large portion of the green from Davis on the front of the card. Misregistrations this drastic usually occur in the gray layer (easier for those to sneak out of the factory because they are subtle?). One scan shows Davis too but that card isn't included in this sale as I don't own one.

Hemphill: $100
